Title: Build Biosensing AI-Native Apps on Azure with BCI, AI Foundry, and Agents Service

**Co‑Author:** [JD Chibuk](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jdchibuk), Founder [Blueberry X](http://blueberryx.com)

We obsessively track our steps, heart rate, and sleep – but what about our mental state? 🧠 Most of us navigate life blind to how stress, focus, and cognitive overload show up in our physiology. Tools to help capture cognitive indicators can help us change how we think, feel and act in high stress situations for the better.

## **🤖 Meet Your Cognitive Copilot**

Imagine an AI agent that quietly observes your indicators relating to cognitive activity, learns your patterns, and supports you in real-time. With breakthrough technologies like fNIRS (functional near-infrared spectroscopy), this isn’t science fiction – it’s happening now. The market has shifted to the new frontier especially those looking for an edge!

These agents don’t replace human judgment; **they supercharge it.** 💪

## **Beyond Basic Wearables**

Unlike simple fitness trackers, these agents use contextualized intelligence. 🧠 Azure’s TypeAgent BCI Sample combines: • 🌊 Cognitive indicator data • 👁️ Audio and visual inputs • 📍 Location and calendar context • ❤️ Biometric signals

The result? Personalized, situationally aware assistants that understand how your cognitive state shifts across different environments, tasks, and social contexts. 🎯

Bio-sensing technology such as fNIRS is modular and small. This means it can fit into a variety of form factors such as eyeglass, hats, headphones and headbands.

The adaptability of this technology while providing indicators including ❤️ pulse rate, 😊 muscle movements (face and eye) and 🩸 deep tissue blood flow response. fNIRS bio-sensing is a great tool for any wearable that needs to include indicators for cognition.

## **🔧 How it could work**

![End-to-end architecture for the TypeAgent BCI sample](https://github.com/Azure-Samples/typeagent-bci-sample/blob/main/public/blog_architecture.png?raw=true)

**Input streams.** Neuro-signals from the BlueberryX headset (fNIRS) plus heart-rate, Teams messages, email, voice, and other sensor data is fused into *Event Grid* or *Event Hubs*. This normalizes everything into a single, time-stamped event feed.

**Meta agent orchestration.** A *Meta Agent* (built with *TypeAgent* or other orchestrators) sits in Azure Container Apps and delegates tasks to specialized sub agents – email replies, guided meditation, deep-breath prompts, design generation, and even golf-stroke analysis.

**Reasoning & content generation.** Each agent taps *Azure AI Foundry* models (gpt-4o, o3, dall-e etc.) through the new *AI Agents Service*, gaining tools for Bing search, function calls, and knowledge retrieval.

**State & search.** Long-term context and time-series data land in *Cosmos DB*, while text and multi-modal embeddings are indexed with *Azure AI Search* for fast RAG-style look-ups.

**Actionable outputs.** The agent swarm produces real-time dashboards, research reports, adaptive meditation scripts, and even AI-generated diagrams – each tailored to the user’s current cognitive state.
